evidence.claim: Sentinel U utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, enabling scalable and secure application deployment.
The platform is HIPAA-compliant, ensuring security and privacy in handling sensitive health information.
Sentinel U supports FHIR standards for interoperability with EHR systems.
Integration capabilities include REST APIs for connecting with other healthcare systems.
Sentinel U leverages Azure for certain application services, enhancing their healthcare platform's performance.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found on their site.
